name: Food Fighters (Pyrrhic, runedj, nikeshayde)
description:
Fight off waves of food themed enemies as you try to get Jack home safe and sound! Collect weapons, items, and health powerups to help you destroy everything in your path!

Submission to Hack K-State 2021. Done over 37 hours by 3 people.

Keyboard Controls

Movement = WASD

Attack = Left Click

Weapons = 1, 2, 3

Pickup = E

Potion = Q

Pause = ESC

Controller Controls

Movement = Joystick

Attack = Right Trigger

Swap Weapon = Left/Right Shoulder

Pickup = Top Button

Potion = Left Button

Pause = Start Button
